eagle.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very large strong bird with a beak like a hook that eats small animals, birds etc
eagle.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: two strokes less than par (=the usual number of strokes for a hole) in a game of golf
eagle.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to use two strokes less than the usual number of strokes for a hole in a game of golf
eagle.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a British weekly comic (=a magazine with stories told in pictures) for boys, which was popular in the 1950s and 1960s. Its best-known character was Dan Dare.
eagle.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: a US gold coin worth ten dollars
eagle.translation[3].definitions[0].exam: Coin dealers have been loading up on American Eagle gold coins, a popular choice for small investors whenever they rush to buy gold.
